The black army assembles to an attack, more correctly to an assault. It was a bit relief because the queen was in front, (not the rook).
I badly wanted to exchange the queens, and to make a safer surrounding to my king.
He did not like it, he might be thinking that it was useful (as same as I thought about the black queen).
The knight is annoying my queen. Since I could not attack the horse from the queen and to keep some pressure on the f7 pawn, I decided to keep it on the same file.
